Reviews.Title: “Very happy, great place!”
Reviews.Author: Ralphyboy1962
Reviews.Content: I needed a place to stay recently when visiting the Orlando area. Doing the usual family stuff, Disney, Universal, etc. We wanted a place where we could cook and relax as if in our home without going broke. We stumbled on this complex, Mango Key. What a nice small community. Very close to all the action, about 4 miles to Disney but very quiet. A great place to relax and unwind. These units are owned by individuals. Some are rented for vacations others are lived in permanently. The pool is big, heated and real clean. The hot tub is nice and warm. We hardly had company in the pool area. We stayed in unit 3. This unit was just remodeled and offered for rent recently. What a beautiful job. Flat screen TVs with DVD players in both bedrooms and the living room. My wife loved the granite counter tops. I enjoyed the couches and screened in porch. The pond and fountain view really made for a nice evening or morning coffee spot. It was nice to be able to park right in front of the door. The kids loved the loft. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value - Clean, Safe & Close to Disney!!!”
Reviews.Author: chaquita1972
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at the Mango Key Complex. The three bedroom unit we stayed in was everything the description said it was and looked just as beautiful as the pictures. It is within 15 minutes of Disney, conveniently located by many stores and restaurants. As a mom to three young children my first concerns were safety and cleanliness. The unit was clean and we felt very safe in the area. The owners were very flexible and made sure the unit was ready for us even though we arrived before check-in time. We will definitely recommend the place to friends and family when they are traveling to Disney.

Reviews.Title: “Great place! Close to Disney! Clean!”
Reviews.Author: Honeybun001
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience here. There was plenty of space in the 2 room rental we had. The kitchen was a great size, and was perfect for cooking. The washer/dryer unit was a great plus, so we were able to pack light. The pool was great and the kids enjoyed the kiddie play area. We can't wait to go back next year!.

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: chezgord
Reviews.Content: At our stay at mango keys we found the staff very helpful. The location was perfect, with two teenagers, being close to parks, shopping and eating places but still having a nice quite oasis to return to. We stayed at No 28 which was well equipt with televisions in every room, dvd player and computer console to keep the teenagers happy. The house was nice an clean with no one overlooking you on the patio. We enjoyed ourself that much that we are going back this October. Well done to all involed in making the place so cute an quite.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place”
Reviews.Author: Alexctba
Reviews.Content: We stayed 40 days inthis house and we loved!!! Is it a quiet place close to everything (markets, drugstore, restaurant, gift shope) and most importantly close to Disney just 10 minutes. We want to come back soon!!! The owners and the managers are very helpful and kind!

Reviews.Title: “Not as advertised”
Reviews.Author: bettybeer
Reviews.Content: Yes, it could accommodate 8 as advertised BUT no room to move about and not enough seating if you had that many people. This is not a resort but more like a small townhouse complex. There was only one tv and limited channel selection. The toilet seat was broken, but fixed when reported. Some of the dishes were chipped and utensils not matching, but that's not a big deal unless you are concerned about inventory control. The place really needed a better cleaning .. One frying pan was so yukky that we couldn't use it. and the lamp shades were ancient, dirty and broken. The spa/hot tub was no warmer than bath water. The washer and dryer in the unit was very good. For us the "resort" was too far from the centre of touristy stuff, and there was no recreation facility on site. In fact no-one was there after 5pm, the place basically closed down. I did relay my opinion to the office before I left and their response was that they only do what "the owner's"? want done as far as furnishings. . On a positive note, the staff was friendly and they did let us into our unit a couple hours early after checking to see if it was "ready" Then later told me that particular unit had not been used for some time..duh! The free long distance phone calls & free internet access was very helpful so we were able to keep in touch with our business back home. There was one little gator in the pond behind the pool but the area was well fenced. There was a nice enclosed lanai with table & chairs. All in all we had a good time and managed quite well.. So if you are looking for a quiet spot a bit out of the hectic areas and not real fussy this seems like a safe location for a family.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: 1hotmomof3
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Villages at Mango Key for our first family trip to Florida this year. The property was very clean and well kept. Our condo was perfect for our family. We had a great stay and made memories to last a life time!

Reviews.Title: “A Little Treasure”
Reviews.Author: Craigmore
Reviews.Content: Yet another superb holiday at Mango Key. It's a real home from home experience. What a benefit having the management company on site to answer all your questions. The house was excellent and had obviously been refurnished. The owners seem to take great care of their property and it was a priviledge to holiday in it. Being able to make free international phone calls and have high speed internet is a real bonus. An excellent location so close to Disney and the attractions, a lovely house, a superb pool and spa overlooking the lake, a quiet clean resort. What more could we ask for. Thank you. We will be back

Reviews.Title: “Cannot recommend Mango Key enough!”
Reviews.Author: parkerfold13
Reviews.Content: This was the 4th time we have stayed at Mango Key, each time in a different property and each time we have had a great time. The accomodation is always clean, roomy and well equipped. A car is essential but the location is ideal for families as it is well located for the theme parks that Orlando is famous for yet far enough away to offer quiet time when needed. There are two Publix supermarkets nearby (turn left or right onto the 192, your choice) and the outdoor pool is excellent for keeping the children amused - in fact most days we had the pool to ourselves until people returned from the theme parks in the early evening. It is not a 5 star resort but you are not paying 5 star prices, excellent value for money and highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “WOW, Everything you need”
Reviews.Author: Maritimedude
Reviews.Content: We arreived at Mango Key on Feb. 26/09 and were blown away by the setup. My 7 year old daughter really liked the fact that she had her own full bathroom to herself, her own TV/DVD in her room. We enjoyed every moment we were there. The pool/Hottub area were clean and ready for use. I would recommend this for anyone with small cheldren or couples. It's only minutes from everything in Orlando and about an hour from Tampa.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing to Complain About!”
Reviews.Author: Fthoodfam
Reviews.Content: What a great stay! We booked our condo the same week my BIL was coming and it was very nice. Upon arrival the condo smelled and looked clean, and the screened in patio was a great bonus. We only used the pool once but it was FANTASTIC. Location was good in proximity to everything, although Florida has way too many stoplights! Everything worked and staff was very helpful, our doorlock malfunctioned one morning and after catching maintanence in the parking lot, we requested it be repaired. We returned in the evening to a BRAND NEW hardward set on the door. Great Service. Don't be fooled...this isn't the Taj Mahal but if your looking to save some money and just have a good time this place is fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “Great Resort”
Reviews.Author: HappyNewYork_NewYork
Reviews.Content: We just recently returned from Mango Key over the Easter hoilday. This is our 5th time staying here. If you want to rate it on getting your monies worth it would be a 10. The price is quite reasonable considering what it has to offer and its proximity to Disney. The rooma are spacious with one of the biggest advantages is having 2 full baths. The pool is well kept as are the grounds. The fact that many of the home owners look after the property while they are vacationing there is a plus. The resort is very quiet and friendly. You get to meet many different ypes of people at the pool which by the way is never crowded. The rooma are well kept and clean. Managerment although not on site are easily reachable just down the road. The resort is only a 10 minute drive to Disney and right off oh highway 192 which has numerous shopping facilities as well as restaurants. I highly recommend that a family stay at this resort. They will not regret it

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!!”
Reviews.Author: flopsymopsy
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the other reviews we were a little concerned. However, we needn't have worried. It was excellent!! House was clean and tidy with every possible utility needed in a home from home, in a quiet and relaxing surrounding....which was great after a long day trekking the numerous parks. As for the pool, we had sole use of this throughout our two weeks, with the occasional visit from Elvis (the resident allligatior). Elvis was not a danger as he was below the pool level, and never ventured out of the pond. He was a delight to watch and photograph. All Parks and International Drive are within easy access to these Townhouses and there are many shops and restaurants to choose from only 5 minutes drive along the road. Would definitely recommend Mango Key and will certainly use them again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: edstone
Reviews.Content: A friend recommended Mango key and we are glad she did. We arrived at night but Mango Key was easy to find off Lindfields Boulevard due the the large illuminated sign at the entrance. Being able to park right outside the front door and no stairs to climb was a treat after a long flight. The villa was clean and bright with a large screened patio ideal for eating outdoors. The pool is shared with the other homes and we met some other guests but it was never very busy and there are plenty of loungers. We would recommend Mango Key for three reasons. 1. It is very close to and easy to get to Disney World. 2. The large very warm pool and hot-tub. 3. Great value for money. Spacious self-catering accommodation including all the facilities you need with 2 double bedrooms both with full en-suites. All for under $100 a night. We have booked in again for our next visit to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “A Relaxing stay”
Reviews.Author: HedgeUk
Reviews.Content: Had a really enjoyable and relaxing holiday at mango key. The instructions on how to enter the developemnt and unit were excellent, and the accommodation was above average. Very clean and tidy and all the facilities you could possibly need for a home from home holiday. The pool and deck of the main pool are excellent and dosen't tend to be too busy. Its a shame that the pool side unit remains unmanned as it would be nice to be able to get a dring and sit by the pool. That apart this is a really excellent place to stay when visiting the Disney area. I will certainly be back. I would recommend Mango Key

Reviews.Title: “Disregard Negative Reviews -- Great for Families at Disney!”
Reviews.Author: rickestine
Reviews.Content: My family just returned from our first-ever trip to Disney World, and we stayed at Mango Key while in Florida. I was a bit concerned before we left because of some of the negative reviews I saw on this website, and I wanted to address some points for travellers who are considering staying at this facility. 1. No, this is not the Hilton. There is no on-site management, but there is a phone number you can call with any problems. The first night we were there our mattress was very lumpy and uncomfortable. We called to tell the management about this in the morning and also requested a DVD player in the unit. When we returned from our day at Disney, there was a DVD player hooked up to the television and the mattress had been REPLACED -- I consider that exceptional service! 2. Our condo was incredibly clean -- from the kitchen and bathrooms to the bedding. No crumbs, bugs, etc. 3. The pool is beautiful and very clean. In fact, we witnessed the pool being cleaned on several occasions during the week. Another nice feature is that they give you the combination to the keypad for the poolside bathrooms so they stay locked yet accessible when needed. 4. The "locals" we encountered were very friendly and chatty -- no one made us feel unwelcome, and we never saw or heard about any problems with car break-ins. We felt very safe during our stay. 5. There is an aligator in the pond behind the condo complex. My five-year old daughter named him Al, and I estimate he is about six feet long. We enjoyed looking out to see if he had surfaced or was sunning himself every day. I never felt like we were in any danger. You just stay away from the back pond (duh), and the pool is totally elevated from the pond, so there's no way you're in any harm. We thought "Al" was a neat feature of the facility, not a hazard. 6. Although the complex seemed to be full -- most parking spots filled up every night -- the place was incredibly quiet. Very important for families seeking downtime from Disney! We never heard a peep from any other guests and had the pool to ourselves most of the week. We recommend Mango Key and will probably return in a few years. Don't believe the negative reviews like I almost did. Make your budget stretch while at Disney and stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Our Stay at Mango Key”
Reviews.Author: Traveler1055
Reviews.Content: We booked a two bedroom/two bath townhouse, checked in on Saturday, July 14. We found our unit in great shape, clean, orderly, plenty of linens. Check-in process was smooth, as we had called in advance to doublecheck the process. The property is small, off the beaten path, away from the busy streets. Very quiet. Even though the property was filled while we were there, we didn't see our neighbors, or hear them at all. Added bonus is free long distance within the US and other countries. We did see one alligator, which was great. We will definitely book this resort again.

Reviews.Title: “Worst exchange we have EVER had!!”
Reviews.Author: familyplus4
Reviews.Content: To say that this is not the Hilton, is a gross understatement. We booked this facility thru RCI and in over 20+ years of exchanging, this is the worst facility we have ever stayed in. There were dead bugs everywhere, the TV did not work, the blinds did not close, & the furniture was from the 1950's. There was gators in the pond which was about 50 yards from the back patio, with no fence, and with 4 children that was not acceptable ( we understand that there are gators in Florida, however information stating that they were so close would have discouraged us from selecting this facility). In a 3 bedroom ( 8 people) unit, there was a table with 4 chairs & one yard sale chair at the counter. This is not at all up to the usual standard of RCI & we have encouraged them to remove this facility from their directory.

Reviews.Title: “Future Guests:”
Reviews.Author: flafla20
Reviews.Content: I'd have to disagree with prior reviews as they seem a bit extreme: First and foremost, this resort is not the Hilton. If your expectations are to be pampered by guest services, a bellhop to carry your bags and a bottle of champagne to great you as you enter your villa -- you've come to the wrong place. There is a management company, not onsite, but available 24 hours a day via a simple phone call that is there to help take care of you. Mango Key is a very, small, peaceful resort. It may lack all the fancy onsite amentiies that newer resorts posess, but it still boosts a very nice, well kept, heated onsite pool -- one that allows you to swim freely without being overcrowded and having a million screaming kids. It's perfect for early morning swims. As was claimed in an earlier review, the pond does not require any sort of security as it is nearly 8-10 feet below the pool and resort area. The gators that were seen there by us were 4 feet or smaller and scrambled back into the water at the sight of humans. The rooms are adequte and priced excellent for the location. As said before, it's NOT the Hilton. Don't expect glamourous fixtures, big screen TVs or egyptian cotton sheets on your bed. Many feature new tiling floor, fairly new carpets and nice furniture. Some of the vanities are a bit older in the bathrooms, but they were still clean. All in all, they are very nice units and you can see that efforts are being made to update them -- however, if expectations are set too high, you'll be let down.

Reviews.Title: “the lousiest accomodations I have ever been at”
Reviews.Author: rockphish
Reviews.Content: I booked a 2 bedroom and a 3 bedroom unit through RCI time shares for 7 aduts and 4 kids to go to Disney. Upon arrival the units were not clean and it appeared that there was no maintanance done on these condos. There are two alligators in a pond directly behind our unit which scared the young children that were with us. There was no staff on site and when our problems were addressed no one ever responded to take care of them. Tvs did not work; the stoves were not cleaned ;we had to replace some of the bed sheets on our own. There was dirt and food crumbs everywhere and silver fish on the floors. I was very disapointed and if you are considering staying in Orlando DO NOT BOOK here or you will be sorry!!!

Reviews.Title: “don`t go if you value your safety”
Reviews.Author: isabelyoung
Reviews.Content: We were here this Spring and witnessed a house break-in and car vandalism! House near us was broken into one night,no-one there to help at all,as the management team go away in the afternoon! When we spoke to the folks who got broken into they said local police said they are often called there because of trouble with local kids nearby who run around at night looking for likely places to break into or vandalise. Sure enough within days someone`s car was damaged,and we ourselves saw the gang jumping ove rthe (low) wall and running off. We were very aware from then on about our personal safety. Also the whole area is very tired looking and why is there an old rusting boat just sitting there looking ugly?Not a pretty sight. Friends of ours were going to rent there but changed their minds when we told them what it really is like,after all there are many resorts down there where you can relax without worrying about security issues

Reviews.Title: “quiet and friendly, nice heated pool and jacuzzi, clean houses and very close to a”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: the great thing about this resort is that although it is more mature it caters for families, and small children can make new friends at the pool . once we went to a villa elsewhere and it was so quiet ,the kids had no one to play with, and it was a 20 minute drive to the attractions. you can be inside the disney complex within five minutes from here. i would recommend this resort for both families and couples who want a quiet time. this may seem strange, but it really is suitable for just lounging or playing with the kids in the pool. the small bar is nice to relax in, and you can watch the children at the same time. it has a homely feel to it and you can keep to yourself or meet up with others and chat away if you wish. you will be well pleased with your choice, and have no regrets!--------bet you will visit here again. it is only 100yds. from the 192 west, everything is within easy reach

HotelInfo.Name: Villages at Mango Key
HotelInfo.Address: 3201 Lindfields Boulevard, Kissimmee, FL 34747
